title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Navigraph - Avionics plugin
description:
In this video we will have a look at the avionics plugin from Navigraph which has been released a few days ago. Using this addon you will have access to the different doc's/maps available for the different sections of the flight. Additionally it will add an option to import your flight plan directly into MSFS.
